sentences.sContent: Students are discovering the endless amount of information in cyberspace.
sentences.sCn: 学生在网络空间里不断发现无穷尽的信息。

remMethod.val: cyber(计算机) + space(空间) → 计算机化世界

trans.tranCn: 虚拟信息空间， 网络空间， 计算机化世界
trans.tranOther: all the connections between computers in different places, considered as a real place where information, messages, pictures etc exist
